ComicInfo.Summary:
Dear Senator: Abraham Lincoln is brought to the far future to run for President.
Snow Woman: Higuchi's brother is killed by a female vampire who returns years later and becomes Higuchi's wife.
The Fiends in Fedoras: A hat seller suddenly has a lot of customers.
Bride of the Non-Man: Tricia is space-wrecked on a world full of mutants.
ComicInfo.Writer: Arnold Drake,Dan Mishkin,Gary Cohn,Robin Snyder,Sheldon Mayer,Thomas Sciacca,Sheldon Mayer,Thomas Sciacca,Dan Mishkin,Gary Cohn,Arnold Drake
